title: The Seventh Scroll (1999) Miniseries DVDRip
description:
THE SEVENTH SCROLL (1999)

A television miniseries based on the novels THE SEVENTH SCROLL and THE RIVER OF GODS by Wilbur Smith. Rare to find.

Drama | Action | Adventure | Fantasy

In the year 3000 BC an illegitimate son is born to Queen Lostris and the brave warrior Tanus. Her devoted eunuch Taita, a loyal servant, takes the baby boy and places him in a basket on the Nile. Five thousand years later, during our time, famous archaeologist Duraid al Simma and his wife Royan discover Queen Lostris&#039;s grave at the same spot, with ten scrolls inside it resembling a form of diary. The seventh scroll, which contains directions to Mamose&#039;s magnificent tomb with the legendary treasure...
